doc.title: Casey's Twins
doc.plot: An Irishman is lighting his pipe and rocking the cradle. Baby cries. He takes it on his lap and gives it a bottle, then sets it on the floor. He then takes a pig from the cradle, dressed in baby clothes, and places it on the floor. The pig proceeds immediately to fight the baby for the bottle. A small dog runs in and takes part in the fight.
